tile.mob_grinding_utils.saw.name: Mob Masher
tile.mob_grinding_utils.spikes.name: Iron Spikes
tile.mob_grinding_utils.tank.name: Singularity Tank
tile.mob_grinding_utils.tank_sink.name: XP Drain Singularity Tank
tile.mob_grinding_utils.xp_tap.name: XP Tap
item.mob_grinding_utils.mob_swab.name: Mob Swab
item.mob_grinding_utils.fan_upgrade.name: Mob Fan Upgrade

_comment_4: Mob Masher Fake Player (Shows in Death Message)
tooltip.fan_1: Pushes Mobs in the facing direction.
tooltip.fan_2: Can be modified with Mob Fan Upgrades.
tooltip.fan_3: Area of Effect can be toggled in it's gui.
tooltip.saw_2: Can be enhanced with Mob Masher Upgrades.
tooltip.saw_3: Mobs Mashed DO count as Player Kills.
tooltip.hopper_1: Vacuums up Items and XP Orbs in a 7x7x7 area.
tooltip.hopper_2: Can be configured to push out on any side.
tooltip.hopper_3: Fluids will insert to Tanks and Items to Inventories.
tooltip.hopper_4: Range is increased by Absorption Radius Upgrades.
tooltip.hopper_5: Area of Effect can be toggled in it's gui.
tooltip.hopper_6: Position can be offset in it's gui.
tooltip.spikes_1: Basic spikes - will also drop Mob's XP.
tooltip.spikes_2: Mobs killed by spikes DO NOT count as Player Kills.
tooltip.xptap_1: Attach to the side of a Singularity Tank.
tooltip.xptap_2: Will turn XP Fluid back to Orbs.
tooltip.withermuffler_3: Right Click to hide Boss Bar.
tooltip.dragonmuffler_3: Right Click to hide Boss Bar.
tooltip.darkoakstone: And they said it couldn't be done...
tooltip.entityconveyor_1: Conveyer to move Mobs and Items along a Horizontal Vector.
tooltip.entityconveyor_2: Mobs Can Spawn on this Block.
tooltip.enderinhibitor_1: Inhibits Teleportation for Entities up to 8 Blocks away.
tooltip.enderinhibitor_2: Can be attached on ANY side of Solid Blocks.
tooltip.mobswab_1: 對著生物使用可以收集它的DNA。
tooltip.mobswab_2: 將它與液態經驗桶、種子一同合成。
